name: Wizard Shooting Game
description:
As the main concept of project revolves around game development. I  have make a single player shooting game with a multiple enemies. Designed the map, complexities, characters to make it more fun. The gamer has to keep track of the enemy, (where they’re going and how fast they’re moving), focus the crosshairs on the enemy, and make sure gunfire is hitting the target while keeping an eye on their health and ammo.

This is just a simple shooting game also can be played by kids, as this is my very 1st game that i've made, i just kept it simple. If many people find it interesting i'll for sure update this game furthermore adding more challenges and vast map.
